## JSONDependent interface

Path based on evaluating a JSON path to determine the value that will be matched.

For example: name: $.request.slots.slot2.value will evaluate the slot with name slot2 name: $.context.storage.key1 will evaluate key1 on the user's storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface JSONDependent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [JSONPathMatch](./stentor-models.jsondependent.jsonpathmatch.md) | [Match](./stentor-models.match.md) | Match data for the JSON path.<!-- -->'name' on Match is the JSON path |
